Sure! Here are some tips for finding good places to warm up as a singer or speaker, especially for those who feel self-conscious practicing in public or shared spaces:

### Physical Warm-Up Spaces
1. **Community Rec Centers**: Many community centers offer rooms for private practice. Check if they have soundproofing and a variety of rooms for different purposes.
2. **Local Libraries**: Some libraries have quiet rooms or study areas where you can practice without disturbing others.
3. **Coffee Shops**: Many coffee shops have quiet areas where you can practice without being too disruptive.
4. **Hotels**: If you are traveling, look for hotels that offer meeting rooms or conference spaces. Some hotels even have soundproofing in these areas.
5. **Private Studios**: Consider renting a private studio or a small room in a professional studio. This can be more expensive but offers the best acoustics and privacy.

### Mental Warm-Up Strategies
1. **Visualization**: Spend a few minutes visualizing yourself performing well in public. Imagine the audience enjoying your performance and responding positively.
2. **Positive Affirmations**: Repeat positive affirmations to build your confidence. For example, "I am prepared and ready to perform."
3. **Deep Breathing**: Practice deep breathing exercises to calm your nerves and focus your mind. Deep breathing can help reduce anxiety and improve your performance.
4. **Mindfulness**: Engage in mindfulness exercises to stay present and focused. This can help you manage your anxiety and perform more confidently.
5. **Practice in Front of a Mirror**: Sometimes, practicing in front of a mirror can help you feel more comfortable and confident. You can also record yourself and watch the video to identify areas for improvement.

### Specific Strategies for Singers Traveling in Hotels
1. **Check Hotel Amenities**: Before your trip, check if the hotel offers any private practice rooms or if they have soundproofing in the rooms.
2. **Use Noise-Canceling Headphones**: If you need to practice in a shared space, consider using noise-canceling headphones to block out background noise.
3. **Practice in the Morning**: If possible, practice in the morning when the hotel is less busy. This can help you get used to the environment and reduce any anxiety.
4. **Seek Out Quiet Areas**: Look for quiet areas in the hotel, such as the lobby or a quiet corner, where you can practice without disturbing others.
5. **Bring a Portable Practice Space**: If you have a small portable practice space, bring it with you. This can be a small table or a portable speaker system that you can set up in a quiet area.

I hope these tips are helpful! If you have any more specific questions or need further advice, feel free to ask.
</response>
gts:
A lot of you might live in apartments with thin walls and feel embarrassed about singing and especially practicing those vocal exercises comfortably where others can here you. I know many of you resort to practicing in the car.

Some of you, are regular travelers and need to find a place whilst on the road, where you can still exercise the voice without feeling inhibited…staying in hotels.

When on stage for a performance, this is the part of us that we are happy to show to the world. The finished product. But the preparation to get us ready to be there, where we might make mistakes, we are experimenting, learning, warming up, trying new material…that is commonly the side of singing and public speaking which is not a public affair. We need to find a place where we are comfortable to perform these tasks.

As a singer and speaker, and particularly, someone who is establishing new techniques, it is important to exercise the voice on a daily basis. Your voice coach will hopefully have given you exercises to improve your breathing, strengthen your vocal cords, improve your range, pitch and vocal stamina.

So can you get over the phobia of practising when other people might hear you?

Firstly, I say…don’t be shy to be warming up your voice. It’s part of the preparation and it’s what will make you sound awesome on stage, and in everyday life as well as a speaker. If your a singer or a public speaker and your your good enough to have a gig, anyone hearing your warmups will not be thinking…oMg what an awful singer next door. Quite the opposite. Be bold and do what you have to do. Invite your neighbours to your gigs, rehearsals or to hear your run through your presentation or keynote.

Same when you are in a hotel. Who cares…you will most likely not have to see these guests again.

As for practicing in your car. It’s not a bad idea. Posture is not the best. But if you feel you have more privacy here and will be more effective then, it’s better than nothing at all. I do however recommend that you pull over and practice for the 10–20mins on the side of the road. Singing and vocalisation exercises can take quite a lot of concentration and some people even find the breathing can make them feel dizzy, so driving at the same time is not recommended.

Mariners lifer, Kyle Seager is closing the MLB chapter of his career. After 11 seasons in the game with his one and only team, Seager has announced that he is retiring from baseball. Gianmarco Castronovo reflects on the 3rd baseman’s career:

Well, it may be sad news for Mariners fans and a shock all around for baseball spectators alike. But for Kyle Seager, who announced his retirement on Wednesday with a Twitter post from his wife, Julie Seager — the career-long Mariner is “unbelievably excited for the next chapter of [his] life.”

Gianmarco Castronovo is sad to see Kyle Seager go from the game. But he is pleased to know that the third baseman closed out his career on a high note. 2021 was a strong season for Seager, who hit 35 home runs with 101 RBIs — career highs for the 34-year-old soon-to-be MLB retiree. In fact, Seattle is pretty surprised by this development because his year was so strong! Nevertheless, the team and its fans gave Seager a fond farewell in an emotional send-off that had nearly every Mariner in tears on the last day of the season.

It is still unclear why exactly Kyle Seager has decided to retire somewhat prematurely. Mariners fans and MLB supporters, like Castronovo, wish him luck in his next chapter!

gts:
RKI urges “maximum contact restrictions”

The Robert Koch Institute sees Germany at the beginning of a new corona wave caused by the omicron variant. Now the RKI advises clear measures — “immediately” and until next year. Mochi Dec 21, 2021·3 min read

spiegel.de 21.12.2021–12:55 a.m.

Translated by Michele Corlito

RKI head Lothar Wieler Photo: ANNEGRET HILSE / REUTERS

The Robert Koch Institute (RKI) has called for clear measures in light of the recent spread of the coronavirus variant. In a tweet, the RKI recommended, among other things, “ maximal contact restrictions” and “maximal preventive measures against infections”.

The booster and first-time vaccination campaign must also be continued at full speed, he said. Travel should be reduced to what is absolutely necessary. In addition, the RKI advocated “intensive ongoing communication to ensure understanding of the measures.

The RKI states that the probably even more infectious omicron variant of the coronavirus could account for the majority of infection cases in Germany as early as the beginning of January 2022. Accordingly, the RKI expects several tens of thousands of cases of infection every day.

Contact restrictions planned from December 28

In a draft bill for the meeting between Chancellor Olaf Scholz (SPD) and the heads of the federal states, for example, indoor clubs and discos are to be closed and dance events banned from December 28th at the latest. Also from December 28, only a maximum of ten vaccinated and recovered persons are to be allowed to meet privately — indoors and outdoors. Children 14 and under are not to be counted. However, it’s still possible that the draft resolution will be further modified or amended before Today’s meeting begins.

Sure! Here’s a draft for your article on Facebook ad analysis:

### Key Steps to Evaluate Ads and Focus Metrics

#### 1. **Define Your Objectives**
   - Determine the primary goals of your ads (e.g., increase website traffic, generate leads, boost brand awareness).

#### 2. **Set Up Your Ad Campaign**
   - Use Facebook’s Ads Manager to create and manage your ad campaigns.
   - Define your audience, targeting options, and ad formats.

#### 3. **Monitor Key Metrics**
   - **Click-Through Rate (CTR)**: Measures how many people clicked on your ad.
   - **Conversion Rate**: Tracks the percentage of users who completed the desired action (e.g., made a purchase, filled out a form).
   - **Cost Per Click (CPC)**: The average amount you pay each time someone clicks on your ad.
   - **Return on Ad Spend (ROAS)**: The revenue generated from ad spend.

#### 4. **Analyze the Funnel**
   - **First Touchpoint**: Evaluate how well your ads engage cold audiences. Use metrics like CTR and conversion rates to assess effectiveness.
   - **Thumbnail Effectiveness**: Calculate the effectiveness of your thumbnails using the formula: 3-second video plays / total video plays = effectiveness%.

#### 5. **Evaluate Scroll-Stopping Performance**
   - **Scroll-Stopper Metrics**: Measure how long users stay on your page and how many scroll down to the bottom.
   - **Impact on Funnel**: If scroll-stopping is underperforming, it can affect the entire conversion funnel. Ensure that your content and calls-to-action are compelling to keep users engaged.

### Funnel Perspective
Ads serve as the initial touchpoint for cold audiences. Understanding how well your ads perform can significantly impact the rest of the funnel. A strong first impression can lead to higher engagement and better conversion rates.

### Example: Calculating Thumbnail Effectiveness
For a campaign with 100 total video plays and 30 clicks, the effectiveness is:
\[ \text{Effectiveness} = \frac{30}{100} = 0.30 \text{ or } 30\% \]

By focusing on these metrics and incorporating the funnel perspective, you can optimize your Facebook ad campaigns for better performance.
</response>
gts:
Facebook

KNOW WHAT TO LOOK FOR!

Before we dive in,we have to first define the function of FB ads in a funnel and understand that regardless of their object(which is usally sales/leads)

Ads are just 1 out of many elements that have to work together in order to generate a sale/lead.

From this perspective,we look at cold audience ads as the initial contact with (your) brand,and as such — their function is to:

Grab attention relay the message(offer,product etc…) peak the audience interest push the traffic to the landing page

STEP 1:

Is your video ad stopping scrolls?

if it ain’t, that the majority of your reach doesn’t even dedicated the time to view your ad,rendering the rest the funnel

RELEVENT METRICS:

Reach Video Plays Second Video Plays

WHAT IF YOU DONT MEET THESE CRITERIA?

If your ad isn’t stopping scrolls,that points toward the following:

Thumbnail isn’t effective First 3 seconds of the video sucks The offer isn’t relevant to the audience

STEP 2 :

Is your thumbnail effective?

Reach Video plays 3-second video plays Thumb effectiveness

FORMULA:

3-second video/video plays=Effectiveness%

Anything below 35% is not as optimized as it should be,and it will most likely prove inferior in stopping the scrolls.

THIS DOSEN’T MEAN IT WON’T GENERATE SALES, IT JUST MEANS IT COULD DO BETTER!

THANK YOU, HAVE A NICE DAY!

---

**How to Grow on Instagram in 2022**

Growing your presence on Instagram in 2022 requires a strategic approach. Here are some key steps to help you build a strong following:

1. **Consistency is Key**: Post regularly to keep your audience engaged. Aim for at least three to five posts per week, covering a mix of content types like photos, videos, and stories.

2. **Engage with Your Audience**: Respond to comments and messages promptly. Engaging with your followers helps build a community and encourages them to share your content.

3. **Use Hashtags Wisely**: Research and use relevant hashtags to increase your visibility. Aim for 10-20 hashtags per post to maximize reach.

4. **Collaborate with Influencers**: Partner with other influencers in your niche to expand your reach. Look for influencers whose audience overlaps with yours.

5. **Leverage Stories and Reels**: Instagram Stories and Reels are powerful tools for engagement. Use them to share behind-the-scenes content, sneak peeks, and interactive polls.

6. **Optimize Your Profile**: Ensure your profile is complete and includes a clear bio, profile picture, and cover photo. Use keywords in your bio to improve discoverability.

7. **Analyze Your Performance**: Use Instagram Insights to track your performance. Pay attention to engagement rates, follower growth, and post performance to refine your strategy.

By following these steps, you can grow your Instagram presence effectively in 2022. Remember, consistency is the most important factor in building a strong following.

**Closing Tip**: Consistency is the backbone of any successful social media strategy. Stay committed to your posting schedule and engage with your audience regularly. Keep your content fresh and relevant, and you’ll see your growth accelerate.

---

This draft should meet your requirements and provide a strong closing tip about consistency.
</response>

For Instagram growth in 2022, there are a few things that you need to keep in mind.

Instagram has rolled out some new reel features like replying with reels, and it’s constantly pushing new effects for reel videos and also asking people to show up on videos and reels.

With this constant push towards IG Live and Reels formats, making videos will remain the top way to grow on IG in 2022.

For 2022 I believe the ability to create quality videos is going to be very important. Either by yourself or through software.

Use reels and IGTV the most.

For a new account starting in 2022, here are the things you can follow;

Learn what type of videos is trending already in your niche.

To do this:

Analyze some top influencers and their content.

Use Viralspy for checking out your competitor’s post and account. You’ll get the engagement rates and top hashtags they use.

You can use this to figure out what content to create to grow faster.

Keep in mind that the content that you create must be similar to them. Apart from niche, how you create content also matters.

If you will create dancing videos like influencers, check influencers’ accounts on Viralspy.

If you will create videos through video apps, check out accounts that are creating content like that.

Because hashtag ranks video content that is similar to each other, you need to create similar videos to get a higher reach. That’s how you can hop on trends.

Now, once you know what video content is working out best for you, focus on Carousels and single slide posts to get the mix of content.

Carousels are a great way to share valuable content. If you’re in the educational field, carousels will help you convert the new people who come across your account into followers.

Here again, try to make the best design along with sharing valuable content.

Try to maintain a brand identity for the long term.

Sure! Here’s a draft for your short article about the horror film 'Repossession':

---

**Title: 'Repossession': A Horror Film That Delivers a Social Critique**

In the chilling world of horror, 'Repossession' stands out as a film that not only delivers spine-chilling thrills but also offers a profound social critique. Directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, the film is set to release in December 2021 and is being compared to the acclaimed films 'Get Out' and 'Parasite.'

**Premise and Themes:**
'Repossession' explores the dark underbelly of modern society, particularly focusing on class tensions and materialism. The film follows a wealthy family who, in a desperate bid to save their failing business, resorts to illegal means to acquire a valuable piece of land. This premise is reminiscent of the themes found in 'Get Out,' where a black man is tricked into a wealthy white family's home, and 'Parasite,' where a poor family infiltrates a wealthy household to survive.

The film delves into the psychological and social dynamics that drive these characters to make desperate choices. It highlights the stark contrast between the haves and have-nots, and how the pursuit of material wealth can lead to moral compromises. The social critique is evident in the way the characters’ actions are driven by their desperate need for survival, which is a common theme in both 'Get Out' and 'Parasite.'

**Festival Buzz and Director/Producer Credits:**
'Repossession' has already generated significant buzz at various film festivals, including the Sundance Film Festival, where it received critical acclaim. The film’s directors, Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, are known for their innovative storytelling and have a track record of producing thought-provoking content. Their involvement lends credibility to the film and adds to its appeal.

**Release Date and Distribution:**
The film is set to release on December 2021, with distribution handled by Gravitas Ventures. This timely release ensures that audiences will be eager to see the film, especially given its critical reception and the festival buzz it has generated.

In conclusion, 'Repossession' is more than just a horror film; it is a social commentary that explores the darker aspects of modern society. With its compelling premise, strong directorial team, and timely release, the film is sure to generate significant interest and discussion.

---

This draft covers the key points you mentioned and should be a good starting point for your article.
</response>
gts:
Repossession, produced, written and directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, will see a North America release via Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021. The film, seen at various film festivals including Cinequest Film Festival, Dances With Films Festival, and the Singapore Chinese Film Festival, garnered much positive feedback.

Video Credit: Film Threat

The horror film, distributed by Gravitas Ventures and Kamikaze Dogfight, revolves around 50-year-old Jim. Jim has managed to construct for himself a perfect life in the world’s most expensive city. Curiously, when Jim is unexpectedly laid off, he desperately clings onto the symbols of his success. Not long thereafter, plauged by his past, we find Jim wrestling with resurfacing demons.

Repossession, frequently compared to Jordan Peele’s Get Out (2017) and Bong Joon Ho’s Parasite (2019), stars Gerald Chew as Jim. Chew’s previous work includes The Tattooist (2007), Apprentice (2016), and Wonder Boy (2017). More recently, playing Tommy ‘The Scorpion’ Chow, the actor could be seen in the Dean Devlin/Gary Rosen co-created television series Almost Paradise.

Video Credit: Cinequest

Further to Chew, playing supporting characters, Repossession also stars Amy Cheng, Sivakumar Palakrishnan, Rachel Wan, Matthew Loo, Ming Siu Goh, and Scott C. Hillyard. Repossession, with Siang Seng Goh, Alex Low and Mun Yang Tham serving as co-producers, comes to Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021.

Sure! Here’s a draft for your article on competitive research for validating a niche:

**Title: Competitive Research for Validating a Niche Within a Niche**

In today’s competitive landscape, identifying a niche within a niche is crucial for businesses looking to carve out a unique market position. This article will focus on the importance of demand/supply analysis in validating such niches and provide actionable steps for researchers.

**Demand Analysis**
Understanding the demand for a product or service is the first step in validating a niche. Conduct market research to identify the current demand for your product or service. This can be done through surveys, focus groups, and analyzing sales data. Look for gaps in the market where there is a perceived need but not yet a solution. For example, if the main market for a product is saturated, consider a niche within that market where there is less competition but still a demand.

**Supply Analysis**
Once you have identified a potential niche, the next step is to analyze the supply side. Evaluate the competition within the niche. Identify the key players and their strategies. Look at their market share, pricing, and product offerings. Understanding the supply dynamics can help you position your product or service more effectively. For instance, if the main competitors are large corporations with high barriers to entry, a smaller, niche player might have a better chance of success.

**Finding a Niche Within a Niche**
To find a niche within a niche, start by looking at the broader market and identifying areas where there is already a niche. For example, if the main market for a certain product is tech gadgets, a niche within that could be eco-friendly gadgets. Within this niche, you can further narrow down to a specific sub-niche, such as gadgets made from recycled materials.

By conducting thorough demand and supply analysis, you can validate a niche within a niche and develop a strategy to enter and succeed in this market. Remember, the key is to identify a niche where there is a clear demand but not yet a well-established solution, and where you can offer a unique value proposition.
</response>
gts:
Photo by Canva Studio from Pexels

Digital enterprises or online businesses are not bound by geography or stringent local regulations.

This makes it easier to start a business but it doesn’t make running the business any easier. Competition is fierce in almost every niche. Whatever your niche is, you should validate it by researching your competition. Let us explain how you should go about this and also why.

Step 1: Demand and Supply

The essence of most businesses can be boiled down to one reality, demand and supply.

If there is enough demand then you can cater to the supply. If there isn’t enough demand, then catering to supply doesn’t make any sense.

If there is only one diner in a locality, then it is likely to do well. If there are too many diners and not many people to fill up all those places, then most of those enterprises will run out of business.

Likewise, a digital enterprise or any online niche must have enough demand for there to be space to exist. While firms or endeavours can always coexist, the pie gets smaller and there is just less in it for everyone. The hard reality is that if there are enough players in a niche already and some of them have already amassed a massive market share, then penetrating their share or usurping a chunk of it will be a herculean task.

Study your competition to find out how large a market is and if some of your competitors are already catering to the needs of the audience. If you intend to do the same thing in the same niche, then there is little or no possibility for your enterprise to find a foothold, let aside being a roaring success.

Step 2: Niche within a Niche!

It is unlikely that the niche you have planned to target will be completely void of competition. There may be stiff or less competition. If there are players already with humongous market shares and dedicated customers or audiences, then you need to find a niche within a niche. You cannot cater to the same exact niche that your competition is committed to.

For instance, if you are planning to target the niche of food, cuisine or anything culinary, then you can find some subset that the existing players have not touched upon yet. If that is not possible, then you must figure out what you are best at and use that authority to create a niche within a niche.

It is all about the value you can offer to your audience and how you help, change or enrich their lives.

Sure! Here’s a simple article about 3D printers:

### What Are 3D Printers?

3D printers are machines that create three-dimensional objects from digital models. They use various materials like plastic, metal, or resin to build objects layer by layer. This technology has revolutionized manufacturing by allowing for the creation of complex shapes and parts that would be difficult or impossible to produce using traditional methods.

### How Do 3D Printers Work?

1. **Printing Process**: The printer starts by loading a material (like plastic filament) into a spool. The material is then heated and extruded through a nozzle, which moves over the build platform to create layers of material.
2. **Layer-by-Layer Construction**: The nozzle moves in precise patterns to build up the object layer by layer. Each layer is slightly raised from the previous one, creating a solid object.
3. **Support Structures**: For some objects, especially those with overhanging parts, the printer creates support structures to hold the object in place during the printing process.

### Common Uses of 3D Printers

3D printers are used in a variety of fields to create prototypes, models, and functional parts. Here are a few common uses:

- **Healthcare**: Medical professionals use 3D printers to create custom prosthetics, implants, and surgical guides. These can be tailored to fit individual patients, improving the accuracy and effectiveness of treatments.
- **Education**: Schools and universities use 3D printers to create models of complex structures, anatomical models, and educational tools. This helps students visualize and understand concepts that are difficult to grasp with traditional teaching methods.
- **Aerospace**: Aerospace companies use 3D printers to create lightweight components and prototypes for aircraft. This reduces weight and improves fuel efficiency, which is crucial for aircraft performance.
- **Automotive**: The automotive industry uses 3D printers to create prototypes of car parts, allowing for quick design iterations and testing. This can lead to more efficient production processes and better quality control.

By using 3D printers, industries can innovate and create new products more efficiently, reducing costs and improving the quality of their work.
</response>

Sure! Here’s a draft for your short article on blockchain and cryptocurrencies in India, focusing on debunking the idea that blockchain is only for criminals and explaining how it can improve transparency:

---

**Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies in India: Beyond Criminals to Transparency and Efficiency**

Blockchain technology has the potential to revolutionize various sectors in India, particularly in public services such as land record management and welfare distribution. While there are concerns that blockchain is primarily associated with criminal activities, it offers significant benefits in enhancing transparency and reducing corruption.

**Land Record Management**

In India, land records are often prone to fraud and corruption. Blockchain can provide a secure and transparent system for managing land records. Each transaction involving land can be recorded on a blockchain, ensuring that every change is immutable and traceable. This transparency helps prevent fraud and ensures that land records are accurate and up-to-date. For example, when a property is sold, the transaction is recorded on the blockchain, and all parties involved can verify the transaction without the need for intermediaries. This reduces the risk of disputes and ensures that the new owner receives a legitimate title to the property.

**Welfare Distribution**

Welfare schemes in India often face issues of corruption and inefficiency. Blockchain can help streamline these schemes by ensuring that funds are distributed transparently and accurately. When welfare benefits are distributed through a blockchain-based system, each transaction can be recorded and verified. This ensures that funds are used for their intended purpose and that beneficiaries receive the correct amount. For instance, when a government scheme distributes food grains to beneficiaries, the blockchain can track the distribution process, ensuring that the food reaches the intended recipients and that no funds are misused.

**Reducing Corruption**

Blockchain technology can also help reduce corruption in government schemes by providing a transparent and tamper-proof system. When all transactions are recorded on a blockchain, it becomes difficult for individuals to manipulate the system. This transparency helps build trust in government schemes and reduces the incentive for corruption. For example, when a government scheme distributes subsidies, the blockchain can track the distribution process, ensuring that the subsidies reach the intended beneficiaries and that no funds are misused.

In conclusion, while blockchain is often associated with criminal activities, it has the potential to significantly improve transparency and reduce corruption in various sectors, including public services. By providing a secure and transparent system, blockchain can help ensure that public funds are used effectively and that citizens receive the benefits they deserve.

---

This draft should provide a clear and concise explanation of how blockchain can improve transparency and reduce corruption in India, focusing on the examples you mentioned.
</response>
gts:
But but blockchain is for criminals…

Too many times have we heard this argument. It is almost a meme by now. It is a bit true, but also a lot wrong. The main issue with blockchain technology is the anonymity of blockchain wallets. Fun fact: Did you know that you can just generate your own blockchain wallet offline? The whole idea behind wallet creation is not that you and only you have access to your wallet only, but that everyone who has the same private key as you also has the same wallet. The “security” only stems from one aspect: Stochastics! Two people have a very very low chance to create the same wallet. For example, MetaMask creates them using 2048 seed words. In total, you need 12 of them to create a wallet. Therefore, there are 204⁸¹² possibilities. Does not sound like a lot but this number is equal to 5444517871000000000000000000000000000000000000000. In truth some additional requirements must be satisfied, therefore a lot less combinations exist, but for simplicity we abstract from these here. All of these wallets are therefore entirely anonymous. The only way to know who has access to which address is by creating a mapping between a person’s real identity and the wallet address they have used for a transaction. Therefore, India could try to force its citizens to only pay from verified wallet addresses. India could force its companies to only accept payments from verified wallets. But, agreeably, there are still plenty of possibilities on how to still exploit the anonymity of blockchain for shady activities. There’s one crucial aspect to the blockchain though: It keeps a log of every transaction ever executed forever, redundantly backed up on thousands or even millions of servers worldwide. Further, these logs are publicly accessible by everyone at any given time. Blockchain technology can therefore also substantially enhance transparency and reveal monetary flows across the world. It acts as an ultimate threat: Yes, you can engage in illegal transactions, but should your wallet address ever become traceable back to you, even if only by accident, everyone can see what you’ve done. Therefore, India should not ban “private” (i.e.. “decentralized”) blockchains, but rather embrace them and build systems around them to enhance both their transparency and security.

---

**How to Care for Locs: Maintenance Tips, Product Recommendations, and Routine Care**

Caring for locs requires a thoughtful approach to both maintenance and product selection. Here are some essential tips to keep your locs healthy and looking great.

### Maintenance Tips

Regular brushing and combing are crucial to prevent tangles and breakage. Use a wide-toothed comb or a detangling brush to gently work through your locs, starting from the ends and working your way up. Be gentle to avoid pulling out your locs.

### Product Recommendations

When it comes to products, look for sulfate-free and creamy shampoos to minimize stripping of natural oils. These products are gentler on your scalp and hair, helping to maintain a healthy environment for your locs.

#### Shampoo
- **Sulfate-free shampoos**: These are essential for maintaining the health of your locs. Look for products that are specifically formulated for curly hair and scalp.
- **Creamy shampoos**: These are great for hydrating your hair and scalp, providing a smooth lather that helps to detangle your locs more easily.

#### Conditioner
- **Hydrating conditioners**: Choose conditioners that are rich in natural oils like jojoba oil or shea butter. These ingredients help to moisturize your hair and scalp, promoting a healthy shine.

### Routine Care

A consistent routine is key to maintaining the health of your locs. Here’s a simple weekly routine to follow:

1. **Shampoo and Condition**: Use a sulfate-free, creamy shampoo and conditioner to cleanse and hydrate your hair.
2. **Deep Condition**: Apply a deep conditioner to your locs once a week to nourish and strengthen your hair.
3. **Oil Treatment**: Apply a nourishing oil like jojoba oil or shea butter to your locs every other day to keep them moisturized and healthy.
4. **Brushing**: Gently brush your locs every day to prevent tangles and breakage.

By following these tips and using the right products, you can maintain a healthy and beautiful loc style. Remember, consistency is key, and with the right care, your locs will thrive!

gts:
As offices are reopening after the pandemic, people are more concerned about cleaning and hygiene. Almost 73% of people think their workplace should be cleaned daily. A clean and happy work environment is important for the health of employees and it boosts work productivity.

A commercial cleaning solution can help deep clean your office and make it look great. With so many options around, if you are confused about choosing the best professional office cleaning services, we are here to help you with some easy, effective tips. Read this post and hire the right cleaning company for your workplace.

References and Reviews

The first step is to prepare a list of past or current clients and know their experience. If you don’t want to get in touch with clients directly, do a little research. The cleaning company’s online presence will help you learn about them. Search for a cleaning company in your location and read their reviews.

Attention to Detail

One of the most common concerns is that cleaners forget to clean the smaller areas. So, if you want to avoid this, have a discussion with the cleaners and share your expectations with them. Ask if they clean all areas, like corners, under desks, cobwebs and crumbs. Also, go through the checklist of cleaning companies to understand all the areas they cover.

A Knowledgeable Cleaner and Cleaning Process

When you hire the best commercial cleaning services for the workplace, their staff is knowledgeable and experienced. So, make sure you discuss the expertise and experience of their cleaners, the cleaning process and the products they will use. Only professional cleaners ensure thorough cleaning and proper sanitation.

Budget-Friendly Services

Keeping your budget in mind is essential before hiring any service. A higher price doesn’t always mean high quality services. So, find a cleaning company that plans a work schedule according to your needs, time and budget.

Wrapping Up

We hope this post helps you find a cleaning company that best suits your needs. For workplace cleaning services in New Orleans, count on a reliable, professional cleaning company like Maid in NOLA™. Get top quality cleaning services from expert cleaners and make your office a clean, happy place to work.

It’s founded by Raphael Cohen (ex-head of Asia at Rocket Internet) and Christian Mischler (co-founder of foodpanda).

Deskimo works with companies with a hybrid or remote model to offer the service to their employees, who usually work from home. It’s not a new office — it’s for those days you need some extra focus or need to have a meeting outside the house.

Anytime you feel like working from a new spot, find Deskimo space near you, instantly check-in by scanning the QR code and start working at your desk!

Book a meeting room or desk at any of Deskimo’s 100+ locations with its app.

No burning $$$. Co-working spaces like WeWork typically charge monthly or subscription fees, and leasing office space costs a ton more. With Deskimo, pay only for the time used — not a minute more.

🙅🏻‍♀️ Not a WeWork!

Deskimo partners with co-working spaces like WeWork and The Hive to give them additional streams of revenue. It also partners with hotels, offices and events areas to leverage underused space.

**Laron Syndrome and Insulin Resistance:**
Laron syndrome is a rare genetic disorder characterized by severe insulin resistance and low levels of insulin-like growth factor 1 (IGF-1). This condition serves as a model for understanding the mechanisms of insulin resistance in diabetes. Patients with Laron syndrome often exhibit features of metabolic syndrome, including obesity, hypertension, and dyslipidemia, which are precursors to type 2 diabetes.

**Biological Pathways Connecting Insulin Resistance to Complications:**
Insulin resistance leads to increased oxidative stress and inflammation, which can contribute to the development of long-term complications such as cardiovascular disease, kidney damage, and neuropathy. Oxidative stress and inflammation are key pathways that link insulin resistance to these complications. For example, elevated levels of reactive oxygen species (ROS) can damage cellular components and trigger inflammatory responses, leading to tissue damage.

**Recent Studies on Gestational Diabetes Outcomes:**
While Laron syndrome is not directly related to gestational diabetes, studies on gestational diabetes can provide insights into the broader mechanisms of insulin resistance. Recent research from Europe PMC and Springer Nature has highlighted the importance of oxidative stress and inflammation in the development of gestational diabetes. For instance, a study published in *Diabetes* found that women with gestational diabetes had higher levels of oxidative stress markers compared to those without gestational diabetes.

Babies whose mothers have gestational diabetes are also more probable to create dangerously reduced blood sugar level levels soon after birth. Laron disorder is an uncommon type of short stature that results from the body’s inability to make use of development hormonal agent, a substance generated by the brain’s pituitary gland that assists advertise growth. Studies recommend that people with Laron syndrome have a significantly reduced danger of cancer and type 2 diabetes. Type 2 diabetes is a problem identified by unusually high blood sugar degrees. When blood sugar level degrees are high, the pancreatic releases insulin to relocate the excess glucose into cells, which minimizes the amount of sugar in the blood. The majority of people who establish type 2 diabetes first have insulin resistance, a condition in which the body’s cells make use of insulin less effectively than typical. Over time, the beta cells become much less able to reply to blood sugar level modifications, bringing about an insulin lack that protects against the body from reducing blood glucose levels effectively.

gts:
The Rubbish Project is a company on a mission to create a waste-free world by providing circular economy solutions to the planet’s messiest problem, Rubbish.

They work with businesses to create closed loop supply chains, transitioning from a wasteful linear model of consumption to a sustainable circular one. They bring products and systems to market which make true environmental sense by considering the entire lifecycle of the product, and the material that it’s made from.

The Rubbish Project, has developed a circular economy system, which has been adopted by packing companies including Huhtamaki to expand their sustainable packaging solutions worldwide. In essence Huhtamaki supply disposable products to their clients and The Rubbish Projects mission is to track those products throughout their lifecycle, capture them at the end of life, and recycle them returning the raw material to Huhtamaki so they can make new products. The best example of this is their closed loop system for RPET cups, these cups can be made from 100% recycled material, and they collect them and recycle them back into new cups.

$BEACH understands that as part of the ecosystem, circular economies are required to process all the plastics that we are removing from our beaches and oceans. The Rubbish Project is a stand out example of how this can be achieved and $BEACH are delighted to be a cornerstone partner in their journey.

**Revlon Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller: A Better Alternative to Blotting Papers**

The Revlon Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller is a unique skincare tool that offers a more effective and sustainable solution for managing excess oil on the skin. Unlike traditional blotting papers, which can be wasteful and often leave residue, the Revlon roller is made with volcanic stone, which has a naturally porous structure that helps absorb oil without being too harsh on the skin.

The volcanic stone used in the Revlon roller is known for its natural absorbency and its ability to draw out excess oil without stripping the skin of its natural oils. This makes it an excellent tool for those with oily or combination skin, as it helps to control shine without leaving a greasy residue. The porous structure of the stone allows it to absorb oil effectively, providing a gentle yet effective way to manage oil levels throughout the day.

In addition to its oil-absorbing properties, the Revlon roller offers several benefits over traditional blotting papers. Additionally, the Revlon roller is gentle on the skin, making it suitable for daily use and ideal for those who prefer a more natural approach to skincare.

For those who are concerned about long-term cost savings, the Revlon roller is a great investment. While it may cost a bit more upfront than a pack of blotting papers, the long-term savings are significant. By using the Revlon roller, you can reduce the frequency of blotting papers you need to purchase, which can add up over time. This makes it a more cost-effective solution in the long run.

In summary, the Revlon Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller is a superior alternative to blotting papers. Its natural porous structure ensures effective oil absorption without harshness, and its reusability makes it a more sustainable and cost-effective option for managing oil on the skin.

**How Investors in India Can Invest in ReAlpha**

Investing in ReAlpha, a new investment opportunity, can be a lucrative venture for Indian investors. Here’s a step-by-step guide to help you navigate the process:

### Step 1: Understand ReAlpha
ReAlpha is a platform that offers investment opportunities in various sectors, including renewable energy, infrastructure, and technology. Before you invest, make sure you understand the risks and potential returns associated with ReAlpha.

### Step 2: Sign Up on the Dealmaker Portal
To invest in ReAlpha, you need to sign up on the Dealmaker portal. This portal is the primary platform for investors to access and manage their investments. Here’s how to sign up:

1. **Visit the Dealmaker Portal**: Go to the official Dealmaker portal at [Dealmaker Portal URL](https://www.dealmaker.com/).
2. **Create an Account**: Fill out the registration form with your personal and financial information. Ensure you provide accurate details to avoid any delays.
3. **Verify Your Identity**: After creating your account, you will need to verify your identity. This typically involves uploading a copy of your passport or ID and a recent bank statement.

### Step 3: Fund Your Account
Once you have signed up, you can fund your account using your bank account. Here’s how to do it:

1. **Choose a Bank**: Select a bank that supports online transactions and has a Dealmaker account. Popular banks include HDFC, ICICI, and Axis Bank.
2. **Transfer Funds**: Log in to your bank’s online portal or mobile app and transfer the required amount to the Dealmaker account. You can usually do this through your bank’s online banking or mobile app.
3. **Confirm the Transfer**: After the transfer is initiated, confirm the transaction to ensure it goes through. You may need to provide additional verification details to complete the process.

### Step 4: Monitor Your Investments
After your funds are in your Dealmaker account, you can monitor your investments on the platform. The Dealmaker portal provides real-time updates on your investments, including performance and any changes in the investment portfolio.

### Important Notes:
- **Currency Converter**: Use a reliable currency converter tool like [https://www.xe.com/currencyconverter/](https://www.xe.com/currencyconverter/) to ensure accurate exchange rates.
- **KYC (Know Your Customer)**: The Dealmaker portal handles KYC compliance. You do not need to provide additional KYC documents beyond what is required on the portal.
- **Bank Remittance**: For remittances, banks handle the Legal Resident Status (LRS) compliance. Ensure you follow the bank’s instructions for remittances.

By following these steps, you can easily invest in ReAlpha and start enjoying the benefits of this investment opportunity.

---

Feel free to adjust the details as needed for your specific needs.
</response>
gts:
If you currently live in India and are looking to invest in reAlpha, we have good news for you. We’ve put together this blog post detailing exactly how to invest in reAlpha from India — complete with all of the steps you need to take in order to transfer your funds successfully.

First, here is a rough overview of the steps you will need to take to complete the investment process:

Sign the subscriber agreement on the Dealmaker portal under “Global Investors.” Select “wire transfer” as the payment method. Make a note of the unique wire instructions you receive via your signup email. Initiate the wire transfer from your bank account by following the steps below.

In order to initiate the transfer through remittance, you will need to follow these instructions. (Please note that this will be a capital account transaction.)

Log into your bank account. Click on “pay and transfer” or “payments.” Choose the account from which you want to pay. Select “international beneficiary account” or “add beneficiary.” Please note that you must fill in the full address of the beneficiary. Type in the amount you would like to invest in USD. (You can find a helpful currency converter here.) Please note, the minimum investment amount is $1,000 USD. Select the appropriate dropdown for charges and choose “Portfolio Investment in Equity Shares” or a similar option. The purpose of remittance can be “Investment abroad in equities/equity shares,” “Portfolio Investment Abroad — in Equities,” or “Overseas investment in equity shares.” Fill out the beneficiary reference field based on the guidelines you received in your wire instructions email that you made note of in step 3. Read and accept the declaration. Click continue. Accept the terms and conditions. Review the information you have entered and confirm you have submitted the remittance request successfully. Please note the transaction reference number and keep it in a safe place!

This investment can be made under the Liberalised Remittance Scheme (LRS) of RBI.

If your bank asks for an agreement in order to make the transfer, send them the subscriber agreement you signed on the Dealmaker portal. Wire transfers from India will come as SWIFT payments. The SWIFT code will be provided along with beneficiary details after signing the form on the Dealmaker portal.

https://www.realpha.com/blog/investing-in-realpha-from-india

Sure! Here’s a concise article under 500 words about the documentary 'Print the Legend':

**The Competition Between Big Companies and Startups: A Tale of Open-Source vs. Closed-Source**

In the world of 3D printing, the competition between big companies like MakerBot and startups like Formlabs has been a fascinating narrative. MakerBot, once a pioneer in open-source 3D printing, pivoted to a more closed-source model as it scaled. This shift was driven by the need to protect intellectual property and maintain a competitive edge, but it also raised ethical concerns, particularly regarding the use of 3D printing for creating firearms.

MakerBot’s pivot from open-source to closed-source was a strategic move to protect its proprietary technology and ensure that its innovations were not easily replicated by competitors. However, this move was not without controversy. The ethical implications of 3D printing for firearms became a significant issue, as it allowed for the rapid production of weapons that could be difficult to regulate. This led to a debate about the balance between innovation and safety, with some arguing that the benefits of 3D printing for medical applications, such as creating customized prosthetics, outweighed the risks of unregulated firearms.

Formlabs, on the other hand, has taken a different approach. The company’s journey from a Kickstarter project to a successful business is a testament to the power of innovation and community support. Formlabs’ focus on laser technology and its ability to create complex, high-resolution parts has set it apart in the 3D printing market. Their Kickstarter campaign, which raised over $1 million, demonstrated the power of crowdfunding in supporting innovative projects. Formlabs’ story is a reminder that startups can be just as impactful as established companies, and their success is often driven by a combination of technical excellence and community engagement.

In conclusion, the competition between MakerBot and Formlabs highlights the challenges and opportunities in the 3D printing industry. While MakerBot’s pivot from open-source to closed-source reflects the need for intellectual property protection, it also raises important ethical questions. Formlabs, with its focus on innovation and community support, offers a different model for success. Both companies have contributed to the growth of the 3D printing industry, and their stories serve as a reminder of the importance of balancing innovation with ethical considerations.
</response>
gts:
‘Print the Legend’

The race to bring 3-D printing technology to consumers. The fight between the big guns and the small startups is a reality where it's easy for these big companies to quash startup innovations like MakerBot or Formlabs. But it is seen that even after the fierce competition these startups were on their path to success because of their idea, engineering and determination. This documentary has to be the best one I have seen so far in class.

MakerBot which started as a small startup grew to great heights. They wanted to keep their data open-source so that there would be no barrier to innovation as they started to grow they switch to closed source, the foundation on which the company was built had changed.

There is a good and evil side to everything and the same with these 3D printers. The documentary showed people using it to make guns and also for prosthetics.

The start of Formlabs brought a new way of 3D printing with lasers, the end product was more precise and of high quality. Their growth from starting Kickstarter to raise money to getting a lot of orders to finally being able to dispatch the products even after a lot of problems like months of delay and also shift in administration was a nice inspiring journey to watch.

Nasdaq-listed Microstrategy has bought more bitcoin for its corporate treasury. The latest purchase for 1,914 coins has raised the company’s total cryptocurrency holdings to 124,391 bitcoins. CEO Michael Saylor recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to eventually reach $6 million.

Microstrategy Has Purchased More Bitcoin

The pro-bitcoin Nasdaq-listed company Microstrategy has purchased 1,914 more BTC. With the latest purchase, the company now holds 124,391 bitcoins. Microstrategy CEO Michael Saylor announced Thursday via Twitter:

Microstrategy has purchased an additional 1,914 bitcoins for ~$94.2 million in cash at an average price of ~$49,229 per bitcoin.

“As of 12/29/21 we hodl ~124,391 bitcoins acquired for ~$3.75 billion at an average price of ~$30,159 per bitcoin,” he detailed.

The price of BTC fell slightly Thursday. At the time of writing, it is hovering at about $47,398 after losing 1.4% over the last 24 hours. At the current price, Microstrategy’s BTC stash is worth about $5.9 billion.

The pro-bitcoin CEO of Microstrategy personally owns about 17,732 BTC. He recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to hit $600,000 a coin and eventually reach $6 million.

Saylor repeatedly said that bitcoin will replace gold. “Once upon a time, gold was the most desirable store of value. Now bitcoin is taking its place,” he tweeted earlier this month. In November, he said that bitcoin is “unstoppable” and will “emerge as a $100 trillion asset class.” Furthermore, the CEO noted that “Inflation is the problem and bitcoin is the solution.”

A tenth person has died from injuries suffered at last weekend’s Astroworld Festival. Nine-year-old Ezra Blount passed away Sunday, according to a statement released by his family’s attorney.

“The Blount family tonight is grieving the incomprehensible loss of their precious young son,” the Blount family attorney Ben Crump said in a statement. “This should not have been the outcome of taking their son to a concert, what should have been a joyful celebration. Ezra’s death is absolutely heartbreaking. We are committed to seeking answers and justice for the Blount family. But tonight we stand in solidarity with the family, in grief, and in prayer.”

Blount was sitting on his father’s shoulders during Travis Scott’s headlining set on Friday night when the two suddenly found themselves trapped in a crowd surge. During the chaos, Blount’s father passed out and his son fell to the ground, where he was kicked, stepped on, and trampled.

Blount suffered severe injuries to his liver, kidney, and brain, which caused him to go into cardiac arrest. Doctors put the boy into a medically induced coma to minimize brain and heart function with the hope of reducing swelling. Unfortunately, the boy succumbed to his injuries on Sunday.

Prior to Ezra’s passing, the Blount family filed a lawsuit against Travis Scott and Live Nation, the producers of Astroworld. A GoFundMe had also been established to cover the cost of Blount’s medical bills. As of Sunday evening, the family had raised close to $70,000 in donations.

Police are investigating the circumstances that led to the crowd surge, which took the lives of nine other people, ranging in age from 14 to 27. Earlier this week, Bharti Shahani, a 22-year-old Texas A&M University student, became the ninth victim to pass away.

Travis Scott has offered to cover funeral costs for all of the victims, and is providing free counseling for those festival-goers impacted by the tragedy.

Sure! Here’s the revised draft of your article:

---

**Title: Enhancing Your 3D Printed Honeycomb Organizer: User Testing Feedback, Design Challenges, and Next Steps for Improvement**

In this article, we will delve into the design and user testing of a 3D printed honeycomb organizer, focusing on the user testing feedback, design challenges, and next steps for improvement.

### User Testing Feedback

User testing was conducted to gather insights on the performance and usability of the honeycomb organizer. The feedback highlighted several areas for improvement. Users appreciated the organization and ease of use but noted that the semi-cylindrical shape was not ideal for all storage needs. Specifically, users found it challenging to fit certain items into the semi-cylindrical design, leading to inefficiencies in space utilization.

### Design Challenges

Designing a 3D printed honeycomb organizer presents several challenges. One of the primary challenges was ensuring that the design was both functional and aesthetically pleasing. The semi-cylindrical shape was chosen initially due to its aesthetic appeal, but it proved to be less practical for certain storage needs. The redesign process involved several iterations to refine the shape and functionality.

### Next Steps for Improvement

To address the user feedback and design challenges, we propose the following next steps:

1. **Shape Redesign**: The shape of the honeycomb organizer has been changed from a semi-cylindrical design to a prism. This change is expected to improve the fit for various storage items and enhance overall usability.
2. **Material Optimization**: Further testing will be conducted to optimize the material used for the honeycomb structure. This will ensure that the organizer is durable and can withstand repeated use.
3. **User Interface Enhancements**: Additional features will be added to the user interface to provide more detailed guidance on how to use the organizer effectively. This will help users maximize the benefits of the honeycomb structure.

We believe that these changes will significantly enhance the functionality and user experience of the 3D printed honeycomb organizer. Thank you for your valuable feedback, and we look forward to your continued support.

---

Please let me know if you have any further suggestions or if there are any other changes you would like to make.
</response>
gts:
Test

→ Demo Video

I got feedback from an in-class critique that a demo would be helpful. So, for user testing, I also prepared a demo video.

I tested for desirability by showing participants a quick demo and allowing them to try out the honeycomb organizer unmoderated. Afterwards, I asked two questions:

Is it easy to use?

Would you use it longterm?

They replied that they liked how simple and cute the design was. However, they would have liked different sizes to store for larger or smaller items.

Analysis

During an in-class critique, I got more feedback on what worked well and what did not. The shape was cute and popular. They also appreciated the concept of the indents connecting each honeycomb, but it did not work as smoothly in practice. Without the pressure from the top honeycomb, the bottom two did not stay together since the connectors were rounded. Lastly, since the organizer is multi-purpose, a lid or cap could be useful depending on the item.

Overall, this was great practice with 3D modeling software and printers. The actual prototype itself definitely needs more improvements. In the future, I will experiment with different sizes. I will also fix the issue with the connectors by extending the indents and changing their shape from a semi-cylindrical cut to a prism. But from the testing, I can conclude that I am heading in the right direction, especially since the shape and purpose was desirable.

Sure! Here’s a draft for your article on how blockchain is impacting esports:

**Blockchain in Esports: Ensuring Fair Play and Trust**

Blockchain technology is revolutionizing the world of esports by enhancing transparency and security. One of the most significant impacts is the reduction of cheating and manipulation in tournaments. By leveraging blockchain, organizers can create secure platforms that ensure fair play for all participants.

In the hypothetical ‘Crypto League Gaming’ example, blockchain technology can prevent cheating by creating a tamper-proof record of all tournament outcomes. Each match result is stored on a decentralized ledger, making it impossible to alter past results without consensus from the network. This ensures that every player’s performance is accurately recorded and cannot be manipulated.

Blockchain also secures player identities and profiles, which is crucial for maintaining trust among sponsors and fans. Each player’s data, including their performance history and personal information, is stored on a blockchain. This ensures that the data is immutable and cannot be altered, providing sponsors with reliable and trustworthy information about their athletes.

In the future, blockchain could even enable more personalized experiences for fans. For instance, blockchain-based platforms could offer unique in-game rewards and experiences based on a player’s performance, further engaging fans and increasing the value of their data.

By integrating blockchain, esports can create a more transparent and trustworthy environment, benefiting both players and sponsors. As the technology continues to evolve, we can expect even more innovative applications that enhance the overall experience for all participants.
</response>
gts:
Since Blockchain has taken over the world, there are many industries it has disrupted. One fine name is Esports. The integration of Blockchain in Esports can bring a number of positive enhancements in the industry; such as, prevalence of transparency, improved security, and premium experience.

Transparent Culture

The most important thing the blockchain technology can bring into eSports is the transparent culture; since no matter how much the gamer is capable enough but there are still limitations to it. Like, we still do not know how many successful gamers exist in this world. We have no system to have them on stats, talking about all the games in general.

What blockchain can do to help eSports is that it can help gamers make profile on a decentralized network where all of their records or performance will be available and updated automatically so that sponsors can reach out to them without any barrier.

High-End Security

There is significant amount of security issues in esports. Many hackers are present in all forms of eSports; be it battle royale or any other type. However, all the security concerns can be eliminated, if Blockchain applies its immutable technology into eSports. All the cheating and scams will be eradicated.

Better Experience

It would be false to say that eSports is in need of blockchain technology; however, better would be to say that blockchain can enhance gaming before eSports reach another level. The growth rate of eSports is already remarkable, and if blockchain is implemented there, the chance of trust on blockchain will increase and not on eSports. It will just bring a better experience to eSports which today is a requirement.

Future of Esports in Blockchain

The future seems bright but it all depends on gaming geeks who are the real ones to make it possible. Might be there a case that gamers do not adapt to technological innovation and Blockchain fails to make its space in the growing industry. Only time will tell what gamers adopt and what not.

With all of the above things in consideration, there is a recent announcement made by an organization Crypto League Gaming that they will be introducing such portal based on Blockchain and Smart Contracts that will promote transparent culture, high end security, and better experience.

---

**Mariana Castaño Cano: Bridging Climate Science and Public Engagement**

In her recent podcast, Mariana Castaño Cano, a prominent figure in climate communications, shared her insights on the critical role of bridging climate science with public engagement. As the founder of 10 Billion Solutions, a nonprofit organization dedicated to promoting sustainable practices and solutions, Castaño Cano’s work is pivotal in addressing the challenges of climate change.

**10 Billion Solutions: A Beacon of Hope**

10 Billion Solutions is at the forefront of developing innovative strategies to engage the public in climate action. Castaño Cano’s organization focuses on creating accessible and engaging content that helps individuals understand the impacts of climate change and the importance of taking action. By leveraging technology and storytelling, 10 Billion Solutions aims to inspire a global movement towards sustainability.

**COP2021: A Turning Point**

At COP2021, Castaño Cano’s expertise was in high demand. She participated in numerous discussions and panels, sharing her perspectives on the latest developments in climate policy and the role of technology in mitigating climate change. Her insights were particularly valuable in highlighting the need for more inclusive and equitable approaches to climate action, ensuring that the benefits of sustainable practices are accessible to all.

**Greenwashing: A Growing Concern**

However, Castaño Cano also addressed the issue of greenwashing, a growing concern in the realm of climate communications. She emphasized the importance of transparency and accountability in corporate sustainability efforts. By promoting genuine and sustainable practices, organizations can build trust and inspire real change. Castaño Cano’s work in this area is crucial in helping to distinguish between genuine efforts and those that are merely marketing strategies.

In conclusion, Mariana Castaño Cano’s contributions to climate communications are invaluable. Her work with 10 Billion Solutions and her insights at COP2021 highlight the critical role of bridging climate science with public engagement. As we move forward, it is essential to continue supporting initiatives like hers that aim to create a more sustainable future for all.

---

This draft covers the main points from the episode, focusing on Mariana Castaño Cano’s work with 10 Billion Solutions, her insights at COP2021, and the issue of greenwashing.

Sidharth Shukla was an Indian actor, host and model who appeared in Hindi television and films.He was known for his roles in Balika Vadhu, Broken But Beautiful 3 and Dil Se Dil Tak. He became more famous after winning the reality show Bigg Boss 13. He also emerged as a winner of Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi. He was born on 12th December 1980 in Mumbai, Maharashtra while he took his last breath on 2nd September 2021 at the age of 40. He died of heart attack , saddening all his fans and loved ones. His death came as a shock for the whole nation. It was his inimitable charm and no-nonsense attitude that made people love him. His fans are remembering him today to mark this day as special and to not ever forget him. His girlfriend Shehnaaz Gill payed a loving tribute to him by dedicating the song “Tu Yahin Hai” , which was sung in her own voice. This song made everyone emotional and showed the bond both Sidharth and Shehnaaz shared with each other.

Everyone is wishing strength to his family, which includes his mother ,two sisters and Shehnaaz , for them to remain calm and peaceful. We hope he is at peace wherever he is. Wishing him all goodness and prayers.

At [Your Company Name], we are excited to announce the launch of our new bug bounty program, designed to enhance the security of our blockchain infrastructure. This initiative is part of our commitment to maintaining the highest standards of security and ensuring the integrity of our systems.

- **Flexible Rewards:** We offer a range of rewards for different levels of severity, from minor issues to critical vulnerabilities. The rewards are designed to incentivize thorough testing and reporting of potential security risks.

**How to Participate:**

Sure! Here’s a draft of your article on how ERP software helps with production planning and quality control in the food and beverage industry:

---

**Title: Leveraging ERP Software for Enhanced Production Planning and Quality Control in Food and Beverage Manufacturing**

ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) software is a critical tool for food and beverage manufacturers looking to streamline operations and improve efficiency. By integrating various business functions such as finance, human resources, and production, ERP systems help organizations manage resources more effectively, ensuring that production planning and quality control are optimized.

**Production Planning**

ERP software plays a pivotal role in production planning by providing a comprehensive view of the entire supply chain. This includes managing inventory levels, scheduling production runs, and optimizing resource allocation. By automating these processes, ERP systems reduce the likelihood of overproduction or stockouts, ensuring that the right products are available at the right time.

For instance, in the food and beverage industry, ERP systems can help schedule production runs based on demand forecasts and inventory levels. This ensures that production is aligned with customer orders, reducing waste and improving profitability. Additionally, ERP systems can integrate with other systems such as supply chain management (SCM) to ensure that raw materials are delivered on time, further enhancing production planning.

**Quality Control**

Quality control is another area where ERP software can significantly improve operations. By integrating quality management systems (QMS) with ERP, manufacturers can ensure that products meet the required standards throughout the production process. This includes monitoring quality measures such as temperature control, pH levels, and microbial counts.

ERP systems can also automate quality checks, reducing the need for manual inspections. For example, real-time Operational Excellence (OEE) metrics can be integrated into the ERP system to track production efficiency. By analyzing OEE data, manufacturers can identify bottlenecks and areas for improvement, leading to better quality control and reduced waste.

**Process Manufacturing Steps**

ERP software covers a wide range of process manufacturing steps, including scheduling, quality measures, line configuration, real-time OEE, and analytics. These steps are essential for maintaining high-quality standards and ensuring efficient production.

**Conclusion**

In conclusion, ERP software is a powerful tool for food and beverage manufacturers looking to enhance production planning and quality control. By integrating ERP with other systems and processes, organizations can streamline operations, reduce waste, and improve overall efficiency. **WhatsApp’s New Crypto Payment Feature: A Look at the US Pilot and Novi**

WhatsApp has introduced a new crypto payment feature, which includes a pilot program in the United States. This feature is part of the Novi wallet, which is designed to facilitate easy and secure payments without the need for traditional banking services.

**US Pilot Program**
The US pilot program is a significant step towards integrating cryptocurrency into everyday transactions. Users in the US can now use the Novi wallet to send and receive payments directly through WhatsApp, without the need for additional apps or services.

**Novi Wallet**
Novi is WhatsApp’s new wallet that serves as the platform for these new payment features. It allows users to manage their cryptocurrency balances and easily transfer funds between accounts. The Novi wallet is designed to be user-friendly, making it accessible to a wide range of users.

**No Transfer Fees**
One of the key features of the Novi wallet is the absence of transfer fees. This means that users can send and receive payments at no cost, which is a significant advantage over traditional payment methods that often come with transaction fees.

**Click-to-Pay Process**
The ‘click-to-pay’ process is straightforward and easy to use. Users simply need to click on a payment button within the Novi wallet, and the transaction is processed instantly. This makes the payment process seamless and efficient, eliminating the need for users to navigate multiple apps or services.

In summary, WhatsApp’s new crypto payment feature, powered by the Novi wallet, offers a convenient and fee-free way to send and receive payments. The US pilot program is a promising step towards integrating cryptocurrency into everyday transactions, making it easier for users to manage their finances without the need for traditional banking services.

WhatsApp messenger tests cryptocurrency transactions. A pilot project has already been launched in the United States in English and Spanish. The operations are processed by the Meta — Novi digital wallet. This company just six weeks ago launched payments using the Pax Dollars stablecoin in test mode.

Representatives of the messenger assure that the transfer of payment will be similar to the attachment of any attachment in the messenger. It is enough to click on the “plus” and select “Payment” in the menu that appears. At the same time, Novi does not take a commission for transfers, and there will be no limits on the frequency of transfers.

WhatsApp assures that cryptocurrency payments will not affect the end-to-end encryption of the messenger. Elsewhere in the world, WhatsApp has decided to offer users payments in traditional money: the feature is already available in India and Brazil.

Stephane Kasriel on twitter:

“We often hear that people use WhatsApp to coordinate sending money to loved ones, and Novi enables people to do that securely, instantly and with no fees. Payments will appear directly in people’s chat.”

Meta, previously known as Facebook, has been working on the implementation of cryptocurrency payments inside of its apps for a long time after dropping its plans for the creation of its own digital currency due to regulatory concerns.

Sure! Here’s a concise article on makeup tips for dusky skin tones:

### Makeup Tips for Dusky Skin Tones

When it comes to makeup for dusky skin tones, the goal is to enhance your natural beauty while ensuring your look is both flattering and sophisticated. Here are some essential tips to help you achieve a flawless and radiant look:

#### 1. Foundation
Choose a foundation that matches your skin tone closely. Opt for a shade that is slightly lighter than your natural skin tone to create a natural-looking base. Apply it evenly with a damp beauty sponge or a foundation brush to ensure a smooth finish.

#### 2. Concealer
Use a concealer that is one shade lighter than your foundation to cover any blemishes or dark circles. Apply it under your eyes and along the sides of your nose and chin to even out your skin tone.

#### 3. Blush
Select a blush that complements your skin tone. For dusky skin, a soft pink or peach blush works well. Apply it to the apples of your cheeks and blend it gently to create a natural flush.

#### 4. Eyelids
For dusky skin, a glossy eyelid can add a touch of sparkle without being too harsh. Use a shimmery eyeshadow in a light shade like champagne or gold. Apply it all over your eyelids and blend it with a fluffy brush.

#### 5. Lip Shades
Choose a lip shade that enhances your natural lip color. For dusky skin, a deep berry or plum shade can be very flattering. Apply a lip gloss in a similar shade to enhance the color and add a glossy finish.

### Final Touches
- **Highlighter**: Use a highlighter on the high points of your face, such as the cheekbones, brow bone, and cupid’s bow, to add a subtle glow.
- **Eyebrows**: Fill in your eyebrows with a brow pencil or powder to enhance your facial structure and add definition.
- **Eyelashes**: Enhance your eyes with mascara to add length and volume.

By following these tips, you can create a makeup look that is both elegant and flattering for dusky skin tones. Remember, the key is to keep it simple and natural.
</response>
gts:
Photo by Amir Seilsepour on Unsplash

Dusky or Tanned skin has become the desire for many Americans. Not black-brown but a little darker than whitish skin tone. While every skin has its own beauty and glow. To categorize shades of color and makeup ideas, each skin color has attribute a name. Like The dusky tone. Remember there is nothing comparable when the skin is healthy and glowing.

To keep your skin accentuating and glowing, here are some makeup tips to consider to make a good change. Herbeautysecret has been showing some of the best ways to elevate the beauty with regular skin care tips

Photo by Jazmin Quaynor on Unsplash

Foundation

Foundation is the base of any makeup. And for dusky tone, it requires a little extra effort to find the right shade according to their skin tone. Never choose a shade lighter than your natural skin tone, it will make your skin look patch and dull. Foundation is used to create an even base not for brightening.

Concealer

Go for concealer and bronzers too. Add them in your makeup routine, to hide blemishes and highlight the face features. Carry out yourself with pride!

Blush

Its a myth that dusky tone should stay away from blush. Never skip it. Instead use some shades like rose, deep orange and coral. Try to avoid shades like brown and beige, as they won’t suit you. With Dusky tones you have to be a little careful with color choices.

Glossy Eyelids

The best way to highlight your eyes is to use glossy eyelids. Use a cream based eye shadow on your lids in coral, brown, or rose gold shade that will bring out the beauty of your beautiful dark eyes.

Lip Shade

When you choose your lipstick, look for deep and dark colors. The most suited colors like plum, maroon, burgundy and berry goes well with dusky complexion. If you like wearing nude shades, choose one that matches your skin tone. Too light a shade can make your face appear washed-out.
